channel.title: Problem With Includes Help Please
channel.description:
everytime i go and click file....download includes i get "error while obtaining includes list" and don't know how to fix it please help
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 06:40:45 PM[/size][hr]...This is really annoying! everything else is fine, i can download srl on it everything, but includes aint working :mad: :mad:[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 06:47:13 PM[/size][hr]Wow...cant anyone post anything about it? i really need help here..I never can use anything in SCAR...this is getting annoying, and Should i use SCAR 3.06 DIVI? cuzz thats pretty much what im trying to use, 2.03 didnt seem to do anything for me

item.title: Problem With Includes Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Get SCAR 3.06+ then
File —> Download SRL…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem With Includes Help Please
item.dc:creator: @needhelpwithscar needhelpwithscar
item.description:
@needhelpwithscar wrote:

Exactly I 1) Go to the Includes Folder in SCAR, default path C:\Program Files\SCAR203\Includes
Make a New folder called ‘SRL’
2) Follow the Picture Setup through Includes --> SRL --> and highlight all of the folders in this rar folder.

Press the big ‘Extract to’ button (Second from left) and select the path of the new SRL folder you just created.

Note: to Extract .rar files, you need Winrar. Download it from http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

  1. Reopen the SRL.rar archive, but this time browse into ‘Plugins’. Move all 4 files into the ‘Plugins’ folder in SCAR defualt path C:\Program Files\SCAR 203\Plugins

  2. Copy and Paste this script into SCAR and Run it. If the words “Successfully Compiled” and “Successfully Executed” Appear after about 2 seconds you have set SRL up correctly. IF not, check the errors below:

I did everything that one guy said to do from the SRL folder to the Extracting includes.

What do i need to do for SRL[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 08:12:21 PM[/size][hr]well,just to let you all know this was a waste of time…i got nothing out of it, and it still has those errors. i dont know why but i may try again some other day f this

Read full topic

item.description:

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL.SCAR does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL\skill\WoodCutting.scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling

Once again this came up, i extracted everything, from the plugins, to the includes and it still doesnt work…im so mad…
